import React from 'react'; import { useReducer } from 'react'; import TotalDisplay from './components/TotalDisplay'; import CalcButton from './components/CalcButton'; import reducer, { initialState } from './reducers'; function App() { const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState) return (
Reducer Challenge
Operation:{state.operation} Memory:{state.memory}
); } export default App;
